meanings.definition: The act of recording a video.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy videoing my cat playing with a ball.
meanings.sent2: She shared a videoing of her dance performance on social media.
meanings.sent3: The videoing of the squirrel trying to steal birdseed was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His videoing of the sunset painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The videoing of the fireworks was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The process of capturing moving images on a camera.
meanings.sent1: Videoing requires a good camera to capture clear images.
meanings.sent2: The videoing at the concert captured the energy of the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The videoing of the baby's first steps was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: Her videoing of the waterfall was like freezing time in motion.
meanings.sent5: The videoing of the storm showed nature's power.

meanings.definition: To film or record using a video camera.
meanings.sent1: I will be videoing the school play for the parents.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys videoing family gatherings to cherish the memories.
meanings.sent3: He was videoing the ants marching in a line.
meanings.sent4: Videoing the waves crashing against the rocks felt therapeutic.
meanings.sent5: They were videoing the street performers for a documentary.
